backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing authorization, user profiles, phone lookup, presence, call state, and signaling storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration logic converting old call status structure to the new one while preserving stored state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the main layout.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Auth button that handles login/logout with Internet Identity and clears React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/branding/FoscoBran: Branding component rendering FOSCO logo and wordmark in small or large variants.
frontend/src/features/call/CallSurface.t: Manages call UI states, connects WebRTC hooks with backend call status, and renders incoming prompts, in-call video, and controls.
frontend/src/features/call/InCallControl: Renders buttons for muting, disabling camera, and ending a call.
frontend/src/features/call/IncomingCallP: Displays an incoming call card with answer and decline actions.
frontend/src/features/call/OutgoingCallP: Handles phone-number lookup and initiates outgoing calls with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/features/call/useCalleeLook: Looks up a user by phone number, checking principal, availability, and profile via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/features/call/useWebRTCCall: Implements WebRTC call setup, signaling, media initialization, peer connection handling, and call lifecycle state.
frontend/src/features/layout/FacetimeOve: Provides a positioned overlay container for Facetime-style video elements.
frontend/src/features/layout/FoscoLayout: Main app layout integrating branding, calls, screen sharing, overlays, and controls.
frontend/src/features/layout/MovieWindow: Displays shared screen stream or placeholder content with optional fullscreen toggle during calls.
frontend/src/features/layout/useFullscre: Hook managing entering, exiting, and tracking fullscreen state.
frontend/src/features/profile/PhoneNumbe: Form card for entering and saving a user's display name and phone number using saveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileDia: Dialog for viewing and editing the user's profile, prefilled from getCallerUserProfile and saved via saveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/Screen: UI controls for starting or stopping screen sharing with optional error display.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/useScr: Hook managing screen sharing state, requesting display media, enabling/disabling backend screencast, and handling errors.
Button that shares the app URL via Web Share API or clipboard fallback with user feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAvailability.ts: Marks the user available or unavailable via actor calls based on mount and page visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for call state, signaling, and screencast operations using actor-backed queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme OKLCH CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn() helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors from CSS variables, adding animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing feature requirements, state, issues, and architecture for the FOSCO app.
